Enumeration.Elements: ms7K, ms14K, ms70K, ms140K, ms700K, ms1M4, ms7M, ms14M
avg4, avg16, avg32, avg64, avg128, avg256, avg512, avg1024

Raise.Condition: not DecodeIDN(IDN, Manufacturer, Model, Field3, Field4)

sts:Status.Block.Text: Format('Capturing waveform %s to file "%s"', TraceName, Filename)
sts:Status.Block.LeaveText: Format('Done capturing waveform %s to file "%s"', TraceName, Filename)

rep:Reporter.Information.Text: Format('Read %d bytes in %f seconds (%f MB/s)', Stream.Size, (EndTime-StartTime)/QueryPerformanceFrequency, Stream.Size / ((EndTime-StartTime)/QueryPerformanceFrequency) / (1024*1024))

sts:Status.Block.LeaveText: Format('Done capturing %s in %d segments', TraceName, FrameHighIndex)

rep:Reporter.Information.Text: Format('Read %d bytes in %f seconds (%f MB/s)', Stream.Size, (EndTime-StartTime)/QueryPerformanceFrequency, Stream.Size / ((EndTime-StartTime)/QueryPerformanceFrequency) / (1024*1024))

sts:Status.Block.Text: Format('Processing %d bytes of segment %d', Stream.Size, ActiveFrameIndex)
sts:Status.Block.LeaveText: Format('Done processing data of segment %d', ActiveFrameIndex)

rep:Reporter.Information.Text: Format('Read %d bytes in %f seconds (%f MB/s)', Stream.Size, (EndTime-StartTime)/QueryPerformanceFrequency, Stream.Size / ((EndTime-StartTime)/QueryPerformanceFrequency) / (1024*1024))
